results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በድንኳኖች ውስጥ የተጨጎሉ የዓይኖቻቸው ጥቁረትና ንጣት ደማቅ የኾኑ ናቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በሚያረገርጉ አረንጓዴ ምንጣፎችና በሚያማምሩ ስጋጃዎች ላይ የተደላደሉ ሲኾኑ (ይቀመጣሉ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
